name: Bodysnatchers
description:
Made for Cozy Autumn Jam 2022, with the theme of "Trading Places", couldn't make anything work with autumn so I chose the given theme. I chose to make it so your character can trade places with the enemies and trick them into shooting eachother. I kind of missed the mark on the "cozy" side of things, but I still hope you enjoy my first attempt at shooter AI.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

SpaceBar - Snatch the body of a guard (Hover mouse on them)
